<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rebound Fulu](/Equipment.aspx?ID=981)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction with the shield to which this fulu is affixed.

 
</row>

</column>

---

The bronze-colored ink on this pale, silvery talisman sharply reflects light, enough that it seems to glow. When you activate the fulu, it reflects your foe's violence back against them. The foe that triggered the Shield Block reaction takes damage equal to your shield's Hardness or the damage they would have dealt before the Shield Block reaction, whichever is less.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
